overview: This is a story of a 17 year-old girl, Jane, who wants to go to medical school. She's very strict, secretive, and sometimes quite unpredictable. Her close friend, Na, that recently went missing finally comes back home as if nothing happened.  Its unfortunate consequence begins. Eventually, ominous mystery will bring her to the dark truth.
tagline: WHAT'S DONE IN LIGHT WILL COME TO DARKNESS.
title: a girl who walks alone at day
